descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=#30b3f7]Sansa - The Lonely Princess.[/color][/heading]
[b]Sansa is a Nord follower inspired by Sansa Stark from Game of Thrones.[/b]

- Sansa uses custom body mesh and skeleton to support pregnancy and body jiggles, so please report back any problems you may find with this features or any other related to this mod in the support forum.

[b][color=#30b3f7]Location:[/color][/b]
- Dragonsreach, Whiterun.

[b][color=#30b3f7]Features:[/color][/b]
[list]
[*]Standalone.
[*]Marriageble.
[*]Blue Elven Archer craftable armor, cloak and cape.
[*]Custom CBBE mesh with Tender Pregnancy Scaling Body.
[*]Full TBBP/BBP, HDT and pregnancy support.
[*]Archery, stealth and light armor perks.
[/list]
[b][color=#30b3f7]Installation:[/color][/b]
- Unpack the content of the "Sansa - The Lonely Princess" file in your skyrim Data folder or with a mod manager.

[b][color=#30b3f7]Highly recomended mods to use with Sansa:[/color][/b]
[list]
[*]HDT Physics Extension for dinamic breasts and butt bounce.
[*]XP32 Maximum Skelleton Extended for full pregnancy, TBBP animations and HDT dynamics.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50526/]My other follower Maximus Nord Follower.[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50674/]And my other follower too, Jenya - Dark Brotherhood Necromancer.[/url]
[/list]

[b][color=#30b3f7]Credits:[/color][/b]
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36036/]Newermind, Elven Archer Armor[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36175/]SydneyB, Ashara Elven archer armour revisited[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21313/]theRoadstroker, Rogue Sorceress Outfit[/url]
[*]blabba and Vioxsis, TPSB body mesh.
[*]groovtama, XP32 Maximum Skelleton Extended.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/]caliente, Caliente Beautiful Bodies Edition.[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/]hellosanta, SG Female Textures Renewal.[/url] and SG Hair Pack.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]lograam, The Eyes of Beauty.[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49285/]Sunspot2, Feminine Hands CBBE UNP[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37022/]Leito86, FemFeet Redesigned[/url]
[/list]

Changelog:
10/06/2014 - Final version 1 - Included Elven Archer armor as default outfit, the Rogue sorceress cloak and cape, added archery, stealth and light armor perks, fixed Dragonsreach translation.
08/06/2014 - Beta1 - Changed hair style, fixed texture problems and updated body mesh to latest version of HDT Body. (WIP)
07/06/2014 - Initial alpha release, basic follower, slight gaps in her ankles. (WIP)
author: Pijuan
